Class StationImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.StationImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, VehicleSampler, Station
public class StationImpl extends Object implements Station, VehicleSampler
A station is a group of related detectors.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • calculateBottleneck

      public void calculateBottleneck(float m, NavigableMap<Float,StationImpl> upstream)
      Calculate whether the station is a bottleneck.
      Parameters:
      m - Mile point of this station.
      upstream - Mapping of mile points to upstream stations.
